Package GUIEngine

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorUtil
    A utility class to obtain a String containing a hex-code of a given Color object.
    exitButtonGUI
    An EventHandler class associated with the Exit button
    GUIMain
    The Main class that coordinates the GUI objects, GUI pages and the linking between the GUI and the backend.
    homeButtonGUI
    An EventHandler class associated with the Home button in the Settings page
    ImageUtil
    A utility class to obtain a Image from its path
    instructionsButtonGUI
    An EventHandler class associated with the How to Play button in the home page
    restartButtonGUI
    An EventHandler class associated with the Restart button
    resumeButtonGUI
    An EventHandler class associated with the Resume button in the home page
    settingsButtonGUI
    An EventHandler class associated with the Settings button in the home page
    startButtonGUI
    An EventHandler class associated with the Start Game button in the home page
    turnGUI
    This is the EventHandler class for each StackPane that represents each cell of the GUI Grid.
    undoButtonGUI
    An EventHandler class associated with the Undo button in the game page
